Platform Forus

Platform Forus facilitates trusted interaction between supply and demand by openly providing smart contracts, API's and corresponding documentation. Users will not depend on trusted third parties to provide security to the agreements which make their interaction possible. The first application built on Platform Forus named "Kindpakket" has been implemented in the municipality of Zuidhorn. The Platform is currently under development and can be followed on our Github page. Visit our Platform page to learn more about the concept of Platform Forus..

FIRST APPLICATION: KINDPAKKET

Together with the Dutch manuciplaity of Zuidhorn we have started a small scale and concrete implementation of Platform Forus. The first module is focussed on the poverty control measure "Kindpakket".
